steps.name: Username
steps.title: Unique username.
steps.description: Username must be provided in order to use it by signing in. The username must be unique.

steps.name: Password & repeating
steps.title: Password typed twice.
steps.description: Password must be provided in order to use it by signing in. Then it must be repeated.

steps.name: Full name
steps.title: Full name for greeting.
steps.description: Full name must be provided for greeting by application, like "Hello XYZ".

steps.name: E-mail address
steps.title: Unique e-mail for communication.
steps.description: E-mail address must be provided to let the application send necessary informations. The e-mail must be unique.

steps.name: (Non)Readonly access
steps.title: Access only for reading or also for modification/removing.
steps.description: Check this if the new application user may only view the data. Leave unchecked if this user may also modify or remove certain data.

steps.name: Username
steps.title: Username (login).
steps.description: Provide username to sign in. Same as during signing up.

steps.name: Password
steps.title: Password.
steps.description: Provide password to sign in. Same as during signing up.

steps.name: Your profile
steps.title: View your profile.
steps.description: Click on right hand side top menu bar and select "View profile".

steps.name: Personal data
steps.title: View your data.
steps.description: The profile view shows your: username, full name, e-mail address, whether your access is readonly and creation/last modification date.

steps.name: Further options
steps.title: What's next?
steps.description: Click on "Change personal data" to modify your personal data (Full name, e-mail, etc.). Click on "Change credentials" to modify your current username or password. Click on "Remove account" in order to permanently delete your account.

steps.name: Full name
steps.title: Changing full name.
steps.description: You may change your full name visible at application greetings.

steps.name: E-mail
steps.title: Changing e-mail address.
steps.description: You may change your contact e-mail address. The e-mail must be unique.

steps.name: (Non)Readonly access
steps.title: Changing mode of access.
steps.description: You may change your mode of application access between readonly and nonreadonly and backwards.

steps.name: Changing options
steps.title: User credentials changing options.
steps.description: You may change username only, password only or both username and password.

steps.name: New username
steps.title: Changed username.
steps.description: You may change your username by providing the new one.

steps.name: Current password
steps.title: Current password.
steps.description: You must provide your current password when changing password to new one.

steps.name: New password & repeating
steps.title: New password typed twice.
steps.description: You may change your current password providing the new one. You must repeat your new password to proceed.

steps.name: Resigning in
steps.title: Resigning in required.
steps.description: Remember when changing username you must resign in with changed one to continue.

steps.name: Removal confirmation
steps.title: User account removal confirmation (Yes/No).
steps.description: You may permanently remove your account by clicking "Yes" or cancel remove by "No".

steps.name: Password
steps.title: Mandatory password control.
steps.description: If account deletion confirmed you must provide your current password and click "Confirm". You may still cancel by clicking "Cancel".

steps.name: Toolbar menu
steps.title: Left top corner personal menu.
steps.description: To sign out you must click on the left hand side top corner menu.

steps.name: Signout
steps.title: Bottom signout option.
steps.description: Then click on "Sign out" option at the very bottom of menu dropdown.
